short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Let your productivity run wild with a plethora of gadgets in every new tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Gadgetly extension will add a bunch of handy gadgets to your new tab so you can customize your new tab to be truly yours and be more productive. 

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing the Chrome extension. The search features within the extension will be provided by Microsoft Bing.

Permission required:
Replace the page you see when opening a new tab
